data.question: What is the chemical formula for NNS1?
At what temperature were the diffraction data for NNS2 and NNS3 collected?
What is the space group of NNS1?
How many vibrational modes are in the 650 cm-1 to 850 cm-1 range for NNS1 according to the PBE model?
What is the experimental yield of NNS1?
data.answer: Experimental yields were not determined due to health risks.

data.question: Is the peak at approximately 1026 nm in the UV-Vis-NIR spectrum of NNS1 characteristic of the Np(V)O2+ cation?
Did the synthesis of NNS1 require the use of trifluoroacetic acid (TFA)?
Was the NO2 group in the NNS3 structure fully resolved?
What was the crystal system used for NNS1?
What method was used to correct for disordered solvent molecules in NNS2?
Was the TGA of NNS1 able to confirm the conversion to NpO2?
What was the purpose of using the SQUEEZE method in the analysis of NNS2?
data.answer: To correct for disordered solvent molecules

data.question: Did the synthesis of NNS1, NNS2, and NNS3 involve a solvothermal method?
What was the role of N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF) in the synthesis of NNS1?
data.answer: It was used as a solvent

data.question: Was the crystallographic data for NNS1 obtained using a Bruker APEX-II Quazar diffractometer?
What was the experimental method used to obtain the Raman spectrum of NNS1?
data.answer: Using a Renishaw inVia Raman Spectrometer

data.question: What was the main challenge in measuring the yield of NNS1?
data.answer: Health risks associated with handling solid-state transuranic materials

data.question: Was the synthesis of NNS1 successful in producing crystals from an emerald green mother liquor?
What computational method was used to optimize the crystal structure of NNS1?
data.answer: VASP package using PBE and PBESol functionals

data.question: Did the TGA analysis of NNS1 indicate a weight loss of approximately 34%?
